Strength & Hypertrophy.description: Build massive muscle and raw strength with progressive overload

amateur.name: Barbell Squats
tips: Keep chest up and core braced

amateur.name: Deadlifts
tips: Hinge at hips, not lower back

amateur.name: Leg Press
tips: Don't lock out knees at top

pro.name: Pigeon Pose
